timeline.bodyText: I believe "Mapbox Telemetry" would be a better name for the setting. "Telemetry Opt In" coupled with the setting description sounds like were collection metrics for the whole app using Mapbox, which we're totally not doing.

timeline.author: sivaraam

timeline.bodyText: I took a stab at trying to make this look smaller and still legible in my small-screen device and the following is what helped/satisfied me: Suggested change With map_attribution defined to the following in string.xml: Mapbox © OpenStreetMap Improve this map]]> Using CDATA, means we don't need ClickableSpan/SpannableString for the linking of the text. This has the advantage that the text clearly appears as a link and the code is readable. Note: To ensure that's not translated we would've to define it in a separate file for strings that don't get translated.
